SEARCH
Package beans

Class TransactionBean

java.lang.Object
beans.TransactionBean
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
@Named @SessionScoped public class TransactionBean extends Object implements Serializable
Manages transaction-related operations and chart visualizations. This bean handles user transactions and provides data for bar and pie charts displaying transaction statistics.
Author:
xromang00

    • TransactionBean

      public TransactionBean()

  • Method Details

    • resetCharts

      public void resetCharts()
      Resets both bar and pie chart models to null. This forces the charts to be recreated next time they are requested.

    • onPageLoad

      public void onPageLoad()
      Lifecycle method called when the page is loaded. Ensures charts are reset to show fresh data.

    • getBarModel

      public org.primefaces.model.charts.bar.BarChartModel getBarModel()
      Gets the bar chart model for transaction visualization. Creates a new model if none exists using lazy loading pattern.
      Returns:
      BarChartModel configured with transaction data

    • getPieModel

      public org.primefaces.model.charts.pie.PieChartModel getPieModel()
      Gets the pie chart model for transaction distribution visualization. Creates a new model if none exists using lazy loading pattern.
      Returns:
      PieChartModel configured with transaction distribution data

    • getUserTransactions

      public List<Transaction> getUserTransactions(Long userId)
      Retrieves a list of transactions for a specific user.
      Parameters:
      userId - the ID of the user whose transactions are to be retrieved.
      Returns:
      a list of transactions associated with the specified user.

    • createBarModel

      public void createBarModel()
      Creates and configures the bar chart model with transaction data. Sets up datasets, labels, and styling options for the visualization.

    • createPieModel

      public void createPieModel()
      Creates and configures the pie chart model showing transaction distribution. Sets up datasets, labels, and styling options for the visualization.

    • getSenderDisplayName

      public String getSenderDisplayName(Transaction transaction, User currentUser)
      Gets the display name of the sender of a transaction.
      Parameters:
      transaction - the transaction to get the sender display name for.
      currentUser - the currently logged in user.
      Returns:
      the display name of the sender.

    • getTransactions

      public List<Transaction> getTransactions()
      Gets the list of transactions.
      Returns:
      the list of transactions.
